definition: multimedia education/abbr. to 電教|电教
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Logic Light was applied in instruction, which symbolized the beginning of Chinese Audio-Visual education.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈應用於教學，標誌中國電化教育的起步。

sentences.english: It is the necessary result of education development for educational techniques to replace audiovisual education.
sentences.chinese: 用教育技術取代電化教育是教育發展的必然結果。
